scripts.predev: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 3000 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object { $_.OwningProcess -ne 0 } | ForEach-Object { Stop-Process -Id $_.OwningProcess -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }; if (Test-Path .next\devlock) { Remove-Item .next\devlock }"
